com.att.aro.commonui
Class DataTableModel<T>

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      com.att.aro.commonui.DataTableModel<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BurstAnalysisTableModel, CacheAnalysisTableModel, ConfigurationTableModel, ExpandedDomainTableModel, FilterApplicationsTableModel, PacketInfoTableModel, RequestResponseTableModel, SimpleDomainTableModel, TCPFlowsTableModel
public abstract class DataTableModel<T>
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel

Represents a base implementation for a table model that is used to display data in JTables. The DataTableModel its table data as a collection of generic objects whose type is defined when the class is used.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getData

public java.util.List<T> getData()
Returns the data contained in the table as a list that cannot be modified. The list returned by this method is made un-modifiable to prevent inadvertent changes to the data in the table.

Returns:
The data contained in the table as a Returns the data java.util.List that cannot be modified.

createDefaultTableColumnModel

public javax.swing.table.TableColumnModel createDefaultTableColumnModel()
Returns a TableColumnModeltable column model that is based on the default table column model for the DataTableModel class. The TableColumnModelcolumn model returned by this method has the same number of columns in the same order and structure as the table column model in the DataTableMod. When a DataTable object is created, this method is used to create the TableColumnModel if one is not specified. This method may be overridden in order to provide customizations to the default column model, such as providing a default column width and/or adding column renderers and/ editors.

Returns:
The TableColumnModel object.

getColumnValue

protected abstract java.lang.Object getColumnValue(T item,
                                                   int columnIndex)
This is the one method that must be implemented by subclasses. This method defines how the data object managed by this table model is mapped to its columns when displayed in a row of the table. The getValueAt() method uses this method to retrieve table cell data.

Parameters:
item -
columnIndex -
Returns:
The table column value calculated for the object
